name: Do or Die!
description:
TUTORIAL

GOAL: Defend your chessboard by knocking Dice Raiders into THE VOID!

WASD TO MOVE

LEFT CLICK ON DICE TO ATTACK. YOUR ATTACK TYPE DEPENDS ON WHICH SIDE OF THE DIE YOU STRIKE

     1. GRAB

 

     2. HOOKSHOT PUNCH

     3. DYNAMITE

 

     4. SHOTGUN

 

AS TIME GOES ON, THE BACKGROUND COLOR CHANGES. WHEN IT BECOMES RED, YOU DIE

KNOCK OFF DICE TO EXTEND THE TIME

Plan your attacks carefully, rack up a high score, and clear the Chess Board of DICEY INFIDELS!
